label: Soil Health Lecture
tooltip: A recorded soil science lecture capturing expert knowledge.

label: Saved Video File
tooltip: Durable stored copy of the lecture for processing.

label: Speech Transcription
tooltip: Converts spoken soil education into text.

label: Transcript
tooltip: Text version of the lecture content.

label: Clean Transcript
tooltip: Normalized and corrected transcript text.

label: Knowledge Chunks
tooltip: Idea-level pieces of soil knowledge with metadata.

label: Semantic Embeddings
tooltip: Mathematical representations of soil concepts.

label: Soil Knowledge Index
tooltip: Searchable memory of soil education.

label: Farmer Question
tooltip: A real-world soil question from a user.

label: Knowledge Retrieval
tooltip: Finds relevant soil knowledge for the question.

label: Relevant Soil Knowledge
tooltip: Retrieved lecture knowledge related to the question.

label: Answer Generation
tooltip: Produces a grounded soil guidance response.

label: Guidance Answer
tooltip: Final answer with supporting soil knowledge.

label: Soil Research Paper
tooltip: Published soil science research and technical documents.

label: Field Observations
tooltip: On-site soil notes from farms and field visits.

label: Soil Lab Report
tooltip: Laboratory soil analysis results.

label: Document File
tooltip: Stored PDF or text document.

label: Text Extraction
tooltip: Extracts readable text from PDFs and scans.

label: Document Text
tooltip: Readable soil content from documents.

label: Clean Text
tooltip: Normalized soil terminology and formatting.

label: Knowledge Chunks
tooltip: Soil knowledge segmented into idea units.

label: Semantic Embeddings
tooltip: Vector meaning of soil knowledge.

label: Soil Knowledge Index
tooltip: Unified searchable soil knowledge memory.
